title: Can talking openly, or catharsis (crying, blowing off steam, etc.) be of any benefit to someone with PTSD? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, but also it could be not beneficial if there is current trauma issues or exposure that is still ongoing in the mind. It could lead to excessive or inappropriate reactions, like crying too much or not knowing how to control the emotions. EDMR would be better, it should only be done with a trained psychologist.
